1110001101110100 1100100110101101 1 -> sum: 1010110100100010, cout: 1
0000001110111100 0010000101101111 1 -> sum: 0010010100101100, cout: 0
0111101011110011 0000010011000011 1 -> sum: 0111111110110111, cout: 0
0111110110111011 0111011111100111 1 -> sum: 1111010110100011, cout: 0
1111100100010000 1000001100001001 0 -> sum: 0111110000011001, cout: 1
0000000111100111 0010001110010110 1 -> sum: 0010010101111110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
